entry.title: Seedream 4.0 Officially Released: Beyond Drawing, Into Imagination
Seed-OSS Open-Source Models Release
entry.summary: Native long context window and flexible control of thinking budget

entry.title: ByteDance Seed Open-Sources VeOmni, Unlocking Any Modality Model Training
entry.summary: Reduces engineering development time from weeks to days.

entry.title: ByteDance Seed Helps Tsinghua Win RoboCup Championship
entry.summary: The first championship win for a Chinese team in the Humanoid AdultSize league.

entry.title: Seed Research￨Seed Diffusion Preview Released: A Diffusion Language Model Delivering Breakthrough 2,146 Tokens/s Inference Speed
entry.summary: Over 100 lines of code can be generated within one second.

entry.title: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0 Released: An End-to-End Simultaneous Interpretation Model Featuring Ultra-High Accuracy Close to Human Interpreters, Low Latency of 3 Seconds, and Real-Time Voice Cloning
entry.summary: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0 achieves SOTA quality in both Chinese-to-English and English-to-Chinese interpretation with ultra-low latency.

entry.title: ByteDance Seed Prover Achieves Silver Medal Score in IMO 2025
entry.summary: Formal verification + computational power scaling at inference time to enhance the depth of mathematical reasoning.

entry.title: Seed Research￨GR-3 Released: A Generalist Robot Model for Generalization, Long-Horizon Tasks, and Bi-Manual Deformable Object Manipulation
entry.summary: A generalizable robot operation model that supports long-range and complex tasks

entry.title: Seed's Open-Source RL Recipe Makes 4B Model Rival 235B on Math Reasoning
entry.summary: 700 steps of RL training enhances the math reasoning power of small models.

entry.title: Meet Seed at ICML 2025: 25 Papers Accepted
entry.summary: 3 of which were selected as Spotlight papers.

entry.title: Built on Seed1.6-Flash, Seed-1.6-Embedding Launched
entry.summary: It stands out with multimodal hybrid retrieval, SOTA performance and flexibility.

entry.title: Introduction to Techniques Used in Seed1.6
entry.summary: Adaptive Thinking Powered by Multimodal Capabilities (Including college entrance examination Scores)
